ISSUE.TITLE: Calling IsSectionDefined throws an exception.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
I am using `RenderSection` to render a `zone` in a view and I want to render certain html elements before and after rendering of zone, only if zone is available. I tried to call `IsSectionDefined ` to verify if zone is present as following ``` @if (IsSectionDefined("News")) {
@await RenderSectionAsync("News", required: false)
} ``` But its throwing following exception. `InvalidOperationException: IsSectionDefined invocation in '/Areas/XXX/Views/XXX.cshtml' is invalid. IsSectionDefined can only be called from a layout page.`
